name: Space! (DogsGames)
description:
Space is game like 1942 game (BUT TOTALLY DIFFERENT) made in 1984. 

TIPS:

F4 or FN+F4 to fullscreen. Sometimes you may be able to pass through meteorites.

Controls:

Space to choose, arrows to move.

HAVE  RAGE  FUN PLAYING!

Game is in development so next levels soon!
